snippet: Alexander Pereira was to begin his six-year tenure at La Scala in Milan in October, but the board voted to honor his contract only until 2015.
abstract: Board of La Scala Opera House votes to dismiss opera theater's incoming director general, Alexander Pereira, at end of his first season, amid charges of conflict of interest.
lead_paragraph: Alexander Pereira was to begin his six-year tenure at La Scala in Milan in October, but the board voted to honor his contract only until 2015.

headline.main: La Scala to Fire Incoming Director After One Season
headline.print_headline: La Scala to Fire Incoming Director After One Season
